title: Banana Chocolate Oat Muffins
directions: Preheat oven to 400Â°F. Puree banana in blender (2/3 cup). In medium bowl, combine pureed banana, egg, honey, almond milk, melted coconut oil and vanilla. In large bowl, combine flour, oats, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Stir banana mixture into dry ingredients with chocolate chips until just blended. Spoon into well-greased 2 1/2 inch muffin cups. Bake 12-15 mins. Remove from pan. Enjoy!
